content.text:
# 2024 Sacramento Republic FC season

The 2024 Sacramento Republic FC season was the club's eleventh season in existence. The club played in the USL Championship, the second tier of the American soccer pyramid. Sacramento Republic FC competes in the Western Conference of the USL Championship.

U.S. Open Cup
As a member of the USL Championship, Orange County entered the U.S. Open Cup in the Round of 32. It was announced by the U.S. Soccer Federation on April 18, 2024, that Orange County would face off against fellow USL Championship team Monterey Bay FC at home.|goals1=Greene  Phillips   López |team2=  Monterey Bay FC |goals2=Guerrero   Robinson |stadium=Heart Health Park|location=Sacramento, California|attendance=2,900|referee=Thomas Supple|result=W}}|goals1=Phillips  López  Amann  Luis Felipe  Herrera |team2= San Jose Earthquakes|goals2=Judd  Espinoza  López |stadium=Heart Health Park|aet=yes|location=Sacramento, California|attendance=5,817|referee=Allen Chapman|result=W}}|goals1=Ross   Herrera   Parano   Gurr |team2= Seattle Sounders FC|goals2=Atencio   Morris |stadium=Heart Health Park|location=Sacramento, California|attendance=|referee=|result=L}}
